name: BIRDS AND BLADES
description:
Couch co-op RTS style game made for 2-4 players. *CONTROLLER REQUIRED*

Play against friends, family, enemies, loved ones, loved dogs, hated dogs, birds, probably not cats. 2-4 players compete against eachother for control of the map.

You fly around the map as a bird, directing your armies & citizens where to go and what to do. Collect resources and fight to win the game. Get a bunch of archers right away and be the most annoying person on the face of planet earth, or have a grace period and wait until you're 6 days, 14 hours, and 13 min into the game to start attacking. Find out how to drop the game into 1 fps or get it up to 1000 fps and then message me, because congratulations, I haven't been able to do either of those things.

  • Exciting 2-4 player gameplay
  • Fight in teams or every man for themselves
  • Procedurally generated world every game
  • Simplified RTS style gameplay
  • No limit to army size. Bigger army, better person.
  • Modifiers to change up the game in unique and interesting ways
  • Efficiency graph at the end of the game
CONTROLS (PS4/XBOX) -
  • TRIANGLE/Y : Fly & Land
  • R1/RB : Open Build Menu
  • L1/LB : Place Building
  • R2/RT : Rally ALL Troops
  • L2/LT : Rally SELECTED Troops
  • D-PAD : Select troops in game
DEVELOPMENT -

I am a solo developer and the game is continuously being worked on. If you find any bugs or have any criticisms please don't be afraid to share, I'm always looking for more feedback. 

As well as bugs, if you have any ideas for new features, I'd also love to know.

All sound effects are attributed to zapsplat..com
